title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working
body: Gys help me plzzzzz.... i cant open my louncher. pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working. how fix it. plzz tell me

replies.body: Help is here!  The patcher needs permission to scan and read game files, otherwise it will receive an error message like this.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
